<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3328</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching children to enjoy reading.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Kinder zum zu lesen zu genießen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enfants d'enseignement pour avoir plaisir lecture.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crianças ensinando para apreciar ler.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bambini d'istruzione da godere leggere.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιδιά διδασκαλίας για να απολαύσει.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Niños de enseñanza a gozar el leer.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a paper which appeared in the ETNI magazine RAG, It attempts to explain what the obstacles are to teaching young students to read, and strategies to make them enjoy their reading.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">books</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Papier, das im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erschien, es versucht, zu erklären, was die Hindernisse zum 
Unterrichten der jungen Kursteilnehmer zu lesen sind und die 
Strategien, zum sie ihren Messwert genießen zu lassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un papier qui est apparu dans le CHIFFON de magazine
d'ETNI, il essaye d'expliquer ce que sont les obstacles à enseigner 
de jeunes étudiants à lire, et des stratégies pour les inciter à 
apprécier leur lecture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um papel que apareça no PANO do compartimento de 
ETNI, ele tenta explicar o que os obstáculos são a ensinar 
estudantes novos ler, e as estratégias para os fazer apreciar sua 
leitura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una carta che è comparso nel PANNO dello 
scomparto di ETNI, esso tenta di spiegare che cosa gli ostacoli sono 
ad insegnare gli allievi giovani leggere e strategie per incitarle a 
godere la loro lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα έγγραφο που εμφανίστηκε στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ 
περιοδικών ETNI, προσπαθεί να εξηγήσει τι τα εμπόδια είναι στη
διδασκαλία των νέων σπουδαστών για να διαβάσουν, και των 
στρατηγικών για να τα κάνουν να απολαύσουν την ανάγνωσή τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un papel que apareció en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, él procura explicar cuáles son los 
obstáculos a enseñar a estudiantes jóvenes leer, y las estrategias 
para hacer que gozan de su lectura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bücher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">livres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">livros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">libri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">libros</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
